title: “The Ramadan Bazaar 2022”
body_lines: “The Ramadan Bazaar 2022” Trade Fair in Colombo kicked off today at the Sri Lanka Exhibition and Convention Center in view of the upcoming Ramadan festival. It will be held on April 29th and 30th from 12 noon to 12 midnight  and you will be able to purchase textiles, gifts, electrical appliances and local confectionery at affordable prices. Pix by Kithsiri De Mel
